definition: Ganges River
permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
surname Heng
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
countless as the grains of sand in the Ganges (idiom)
rhesus macaque (Macaca mulatta)/rhesus monkey/lit. river Ganges monkey of north India

sentences.english: The research was conducted in rhesus monkeys, which are considered an excellent model of human drug users.
sentences.chinese: 研究所用的恆河猴被認爲是人類藥癮者的良好模型。

sentences.english: First the Ganges, the sacred river of India.
sentences.chinese: 首先是印度的聖河恆河。

sentences.english: Objective The regulation of hormonal secretion in dispersed Leydig cell of rhesus monkey.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究恆河猴睾丸的激素分泌及其調節作用。

sentences.english: Six monkeys (macaca mulatta) and seven pigeons were used as Ss in the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 六隻恆河猴和七盡鴿子用作實驗動物。

sentences.english: The bank of the Ganges welcomed me into its lap like a friend of a former birth.
sentences.chinese: 恆河河岸就像我前生前世的老友一樣擁我入懷。

sentences.english: Yesterday he was telling me in what great reverence people of this locality hold the sacred river Ganges.
sentences.chinese: 昨天他告訴我當地人是怎樣尊敬神聖的恆河的。

sentences.english: Ane they tumble from this higher land to meet the Ganges on the plains.
sentences.chinese: 支流從高地往下流，與平原上的恆河匯合。

sentences.english: The party entered holy Benares by boat along the Ganges .
sentences.chinese: 隨行人員乘小舟延着恆河進入神聖的貝拿勒斯。

sentences.english: The pure Walden water is mingled with the sacred water of the Ganges.
sentences.chinese: 瓦爾登的純粹的水已經和恆河的聖水混合了。

sentences.english: This vast expanse of lowland is known as the Gangetic Plains.
sentences.chinese: 廣大的低窪地帶便是恆河平原。

sentences.english: This sand beneath my feet is getting dry again.
sentences.chinese: 恆河沙踩在腳下又幹燥一遍。

sentences.english: Only the most determined make the final journey up valley to the farthest extremity of the river.
sentences.chinese: 只有最虔誠的朝聖者纔會攀抵恆河末端最遠處的山谷。

sentences.english: The cremation ghats in Varanasi burn day and night.
sentences.chinese: 在恆河邊火葬日夜不息。

sentences.english: These mountain slopes feed the true headwaters of the Ganges.
sentences.chinese: 這些山脈纔是恆河水的真正源頭。

sentences.english: The underground sediment of the Ganges Delta contains arsenic.
sentences.chinese: 恆河三角洲的地下沉積物中含有砷。

sentences.english: The river was said to have been entangled in Lord Shiva's locks, to save the earth from destruction.
sentences.chinese: 恆河被纏繞在溼婆神的鎖釦上，以防損壞大地。

definition: (of a monk) to travel/itinerant
Machu Picchu
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
Himalayas
pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: the secular world
Lumbini, Nepal, birthplace of Siddhartha Gautama 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2] founder of Buddhism (also written 嵐毘尼|岚毗尼[Lan2 pi2 ni2], 臘伐尼|腊伐尼[La4 fa2 ni2], 林微尼[Lin2 wei1 ni2])
Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss or Sukhavati (Sanskrit)
pinyin: xi1 fang1 ji2 le4 shi4 jie4

definition: Polo (car made by Volkswagen)/surname Polo
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
Shuangxi or Shuanghsi township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Goddess peak (Nepalese: Sagarmatha, Sky Goddess)/refers to Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan), Chinese 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰/Mt Everest
silent prayer/pray in silence
to mumble/to mutter to oneself
geisha (Japanese female entertainer)/also written 藝妓|艺妓[yi4 ji4]
one who surmounts all obstacles (Buddhism)
